text: Johan Antoon Christiaan van Panhuys (26 September 1768 â€“ 28 May 1835) was a politician from Maastricht, that was at the time of his birth a city within Kingdom of France (now the Netherlands). In the United Kingdom of the Netherlands he was a member of the 1914 Assemblee of notables and served for Limburg as a member of the House of Representatives from 1815 to 1819. He was a member of the Council of Finance of the Dutch East Indies from 1821 to 1832. Van Panhuys died in Maastricht on 28 May 1835, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1768 births Category:1835 deaths Category:Politicians from Maastricht Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands
title: Johan Antoon Christiaan van Panhuys
